lines: I am good, thanks for asking!
Granted, you do not actually have the ability to respond
But I am asking anyway, because I am nice.
Up ahead are some warps that will take you to test areas
Use them to practise agaisnt various things, though beware
that the test areas are just as dangerous as the exam itself
We mostly use these for trying new ideas out, really
Just walk up to one and press E to enter it.
